sentences.cn: …布伦达和她的男朋友安东尼。

sentences.en: "She's probably had a row with her boyfriend," Charles opined.
sentences.cn: “她大概跟男朋友吵架了，”查尔斯说道。

sentences.en: "They play classic rock'n"roll,' states her boyfriend, "My dad digs them too."
sentences.cn: “他们演奏经典摇滚乐，”她的男朋友说道，“我爸爸也喜欢他们。”

sentences.en: Dan found out that I had been meeting my ex-boyfriend in secret.
sentences.cn: 丹发现我一直在跟前男友偷偷见面。

sentences.en: I split up with my boyfriend last year.
I split up with my last boyfriend three years ago.
sentences.cn: 我3年前和前任男友分的手。

sentences.en: It's a bit much expecting me to dump your boyfriend for you.
sentences.cn: 指望我替你甩掉你的男朋友，有点儿过分了吧？

sentences.en: Lisa was irritated by the slovenly attitude of her boyfriend Sean.
sentences.cn: 莉萨对男朋友肖恩吊儿郎当的态度非常恼火。

sentences.en: Mark was heartbroken when Jane returned to her old boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 简同前男友旧情复燃，这使马克心都碎了。

sentences.en: My boyfriend and I robbed a store and were caught red-handed.
sentences.cn: 我和男朋友去抢劫一家商店，被当场逮到了。

sentences.en: My boyfriend was threatening to finish with me.
sentences.cn: 男友威胁说要和我分手。

sentences.en: My ex-boyfriend Anthony was very chauvinistic.
sentences.cn: 我的前男友安东尼大男子主义思想很重。

sentences.en: She took revenge on her ex-boyfriend by smashing up his home.
sentences.cn: 为了报复，她砸了前任男友的家。

sentences.en: She was living in sin with her boyfriend.

trans.tran_en: a man that you are having a romantic relationship with
